heal_quest_1.name: Healing the Hurt
heal_quest_1.idle_prompt: If only I had more viridian leaves, I could ease so much suffering...
heal_quest_1.talk_prompt: Thank you for asking. My supplies are terribly low. If you could bring me a viridian leaf, I can teach you a basic prayer of healing.
heal_quest_1.reward_message: The priest accepts the viridian leaf gratefully. 'Thank you, traveler. Your spirit is strong. Let me show you how to channel it to restore the body.' You have learned Minor Heal!
heal_quest_1.already_learned_message: The priest smiles. 'Thank you again for your help, traveler. May your light shine bright.'

priest_quest_2.name: A Sturdier Spirit
priest_quest_2.idle_prompt: These poor patrons... they need more than just healing. They need protection. Some ruined pelts would make for good practice dummies...
priest_quest_2.talk_prompt: You've learned to heal, but now you must learn to protect. Bring me 3 ruined pelts so I can demonstrate how to shield the spirit from harm.
priest_quest_2.reward_message: You hand over the ruined pelts. The priest nods, 'Good. Now watch closely...' You learn how to form a Spirit Shield!
priest_quest_2.already_learned_message: The priest nods. 'Your spirit is well protected now.'

shock_quest_1.name: Arcane Components
shock_quest_1.idle_prompt: This research is... lacking! I need components with a strong energetic signature, like a monster claw.
shock_quest_1.talk_prompt: You want to learn? Knowledge is not free. Bring me a monster claw. I need it for my research, and perhaps I'll show you a simple spark.
shock_quest_1.reward_message: The elementalist snatches the claw. 'Good. These have the right energetic signature.' They show you a simple gesture, and you feel a jolt of power. You have learned Minor Shock!
shock_quest_1.already_learned_message: The elementalist nods. 'More claws? I suppose I can take them. Your knowledge is already secure.'

elementalist_quest_2.name: Conductive Materials
elementalist_quest_2.idle_prompt: A simple spark is nothing. To channel true power, one needs... insulators. Ruined pelts are poor, but they will suffice for target practice.
elementalist_quest_2.talk_prompt: That little jolt was just a parlor trick. You want to learn a real spell? Bring me 3 ruined pelts. I will use them to show you what a concentrated blast can do.
elementalist_quest_2.reward_message: You hand the elementalist the ruined pelts. 'Finally.' He sets them up and incinerates them with a powerful jolt. 'That is how it's done.' You have learned Shock!
elementalist_quest_2.already_learned_message: The elementalist seems annoyed. 'I have nothing more to teach you right now.'

trip_quest_1.name: Trip Training
trip_quest_1.idle_prompt: Hmph. Another greenhorn. They walk right past, no situational awareness... they'll be flat on their back before they leave the city gates.
trip_quest_1.talk_prompt: You! You look like you could learn a thing or two about leverage. Wield a proper weapon - a polearm, a staff, something with reach - and I'll show you how to put someone on their back. Once you're ready, try to TRIP me. We'll see if you learn anything.
trip_quest_1.reward_message: This message is not used, the reward is handled in the TRIP verb itself.
trip_quest_1.already_learned_message: The warrior just grunts at you.

innkeeper_quest_1.name: Clearing the Debt
innkeeper_quest_1.idle_prompt: Ah, you're awake. Come see me when you're ready to settle your bill.
innkeeper_quest_1.talk_prompt: Ah, you're awake! About your bill... you can check your WEALTH, but I suspect you're a bit light. No matter. Before you head out, you can CHECK IN with me any time to use the room for training. When you're ready to clear your bill, I have an arrangement with the Town Clerk. Take this late 'Lodging Tax' payment to him at the Town Hall. You can use GOTO TOWNHALL. He'll... have more for you to do. Welcome to the city. [Help: GOTO] [Help: CHECK IN]
innkeeper_quest_1.reward_message: The Town Clerk takes the envelope. 'The Innkeeper's late again... Thank you. Listen, I'm buried in work. Could you run a few more deliveries? First, take this ore requisition to the Armorer at the Armory. You can GOTO ARMORY.'
innkeeper_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Innkeeper nods. 'The Clerk tells me you've been a great help. Your debt is clear. Feel free to use the room!'

clerk_quest_1.name: Ore for the Smith
clerk_quest_1.talk_prompt: Have you delivered that ore requisition to the armorer at the Armory yet?
clerk_quest_1.reward_message: The Armorer takes the form and hands you 100 silver. 'Good. I can't make armor without ore. Speaking of armor, I need this requisition for leather padding taken to the Furrier. You can GOTO FURRIER. He'll probably have some pelts he needs to get rid of, which you can SELL to him.' [Help: LIST] - You can see what a merchant has for sale by typing LIST. [Help: BUY] - You can BUY items from them.
clerk_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Armorer is busy at his forge.

blacksmith_quest_1.name: Leather for the Smith
blacksmith_quest_1.talk_prompt: Did you take that leather requisition to the Furrier?
blacksmith_quest_1.reward_message: The Furrier grunts and takes the order. 'Leather strapping. Fine. Speaking of components, the Apothecary needed this bundle of cured sinew. Take it to her shop. You can GOTO APOTHECARY.' [Help: SELL] - By the way, if you find any pelts, I'm the one who buys them. Just SELL PELTS to me.
blacksmith_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Furrier is busy skinning a pelt.

furrier_quest_1.name: Sinew for the Alchemist
furrier_quest_1.talk_prompt: The Apothecary is still waiting for that sinew.
furrier_quest_1.reward_message: The Apothecary smiles. 'Wonderful! Can't brew without a binder. My weekly tithe is also ready. Take this box of salves to the Priest at the Temple. You can GOTO TEMPLE.' [Help: FORAGE] - Also, dear, if you FORAGE near the old well, you might find some herbs. Be careful, I hear monsters lurk down there. Bring any you find to me!
furrier_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Apothecary is busy at her workbench.

apothecary_quest_1.name: Salves for the Temple
apothecary_quest_1.talk_prompt: The priest at the Temple is expecting those salves.
apothecary_quest_1.reward_message: The Priest accepts the box. 'The Apothecary is a kind soul. These will help many. Ah, speaking of help, a 'mercenary' was just boasting about killing orcs near the North Gate. Please take this patrol notice to the Guard Captain at the Barracks. We must be wary of combat.' [Help: ATTACK] - To ATTACK a creature, type `ATTACK {target}`. [Help: STANCE] - You can change your combat STANCE to be more offensive or defensive.
apothecary_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Priest nods to you in thanks.

priest_quest_errand_1.name: Notice for the Watch
priest_quest_errand_1.talk_prompt: Don't keep the Guard Captain waiting for that notice. He's at the Barracks.
priest_quest_errand_1.reward_message: The Guard Captain reads the note and sighs. 'A mercenary? Great. More paperwork. And magical abilities, you say? The Elementalist in the Study should be warned. Take him this recruitment poster; that's as good an excuse as any.'
priest_quest_errand_1.already_learned_message: The Guard Captain is busy shouting at recruits.

captain_quest_1.name: Poster for the Elementalist
captain_quest_1.talk_prompt: Please get that poster to the Elementalist.
captain_quest_1.reward_message: The Elementalist scoffs at the poster. 'Recruits? Bah! The Captain can... wait. Overdue books? The Librarian! He's hounding me! Take this request to him at the Library. Tell him to fetch his own books!'

elementalist_quest_errand_1.name: Request for the Librarian
elementalist_quest_errand_1.talk_prompt: Please get that... forceful request... to the Library archives.
elementalist_quest_errand_1.reward_message: The Librarian sighs. 'Oh, dear. 'Illusory Set Design.' I know just the ones. The Theatre Master has had them for ages. Please take these to the Theatre. Be firm.'

librarian_quest_1.name: The Overdue Books
librarian_quest_1.talk_prompt: The Theatre Master has had those books for too long! Please retrieve them.
librarian_quest_1.reward_message: The Theatre Master sighs dramatically. 'Oh, fine! My muse has left me anyway. He has no appreciation for art! Now be a darling and run this note to the Bank. I need to pay my debts at the Town Hall, and they only take silver.'
librarian_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Theatre Master is busy rehearsing.

theatre_quest_1.name: The Bank Note
theatre_quest_1.talk_prompt: That note needs to get to the Bank!
theatre_quest_1.reward_message: The banker initials the note, takes a bag of coins, and hands you 500 silver along with a final receipt. 'Here is your silver. Please take this receipt to the Town Clerk at the Town Hall to settle the matter.'
theatre_quest_1.already_learned_message: The banker nods. 'Your accounts are in order.'

bank_quest_1.name: The Final Receipt
bank_quest_1.talk_prompt: That receipt needs to get back to the Town Clerk at the Town Hall!
bank_quest_1.reward_message: The Town Clerk is relieved. 'That's... all of them? Amazing! You've been a huge help. Here is your final pay. I'll let the Innkeeper know your debt is clear. You've earned it!' You are awarded 250 silver. [Help: CHECK IN] - You must be tired from all that running around. You should CHECK IN at the inn to train your skills.
bank_quest_1.already_learned_message: The Town Clerk nods. 'Thank you again for your help.'

aethelion_duties.name: Duties of the Light
aethelion_duties.progress_prompt: The temple is not yet in order. Attend to the discs, the braziers, the steps, the prism, and the poor at our gates. And do not forget your vows.
aethelion_duties.talk_prompt: The temple shines, and your soul reflects its light. You have served with humility.
aethelion_duties.reward_message: The High Priest smiles. 'You understand that true power comes from service. Receive now the blessing of inner strength.' You have learned Resist Fear!
